pages.name: Ritual of the Shepherd
pages.text: Use a Ritual Diviner for easier contruction.
Increases the maturity rate of baby animals within its range.$(br2)$(#0000aa)Water Runes: 4$(br)$(#aaaa00)Air Runes: 4$(br)$(br)$(#00aa00)Earth Runes: 4$(br)$()Dusk Runes: 4$(br2)$()Total Runes: 16

Will Augmentations:$(br2)(Raw) Increases the speed of the ritual based on the total Will in the Aura.$(br)(Corrosive) Unimplemented.$(br)(Destructive) Causes adults that have not bred lately to run at mobs and explode.$(br)(Vengeful) Decreases the time it takes for adults to breed again.$(br)(Steadfast) Automatically breeds adults within its area using items in the connected chest.
